    • Constructor Detail

      • Seat

        public Seat(int row,
            int column,
            Auditorium aud)
        Three-argument constructor. Row is set to a given number, column is set to a given number,occupied is set to false and aud is set to given auditorium.
        Parameters:
        row - the seat`s row as an integer
        column - the seat`s column as an integer
        aud - the seat`s auditorium as an auditorium
